duties_responsibilities.duty: Leverage existing strategic client relationships to expand sales and develop comprehensive account plans.
Identify, bid on, negotiate, and close new sales opportunities while maintaining accurate and detailed sales forecasts.
Build and manage internal and external relationships with partners and high performing talent recruitment.
Manage client and team meetings, funnel and deal management, and sequential improvements in close rates.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent education and experience (Master's preferred)
